file_content.text: Darth Arho refuses to surrender. He knows it could take weeks before we break the Imperial defenses and reclaim the temple.
Fortunately, there is another way in--an underground escape tunnel built centuries ago.
We need you to infiltrate the temple through the escape tunnel while we engage the Imperials outside.
The Imperials have had plenty of time to search the temple. I doubt that tunnel's still undefended.
What if they found it?
You're probably right. Our offensive will draw most of the defenders away, but I'm sure you'll still have plenty of Imps to deal with.
What about our man on the inside? Is he going to help?
Any word from Malgus?
No recent contact. Malgus seems to have disappeared. But at least we know his followers aren't supporting Arho.
Troops are massing now, along with all available Jedi.
I know the temple well. If you clear the way, I can lead a team of Jedi to capture key strategic locations, like the armory.
Without Master Boudyn's Jedi, our troops will suffer greater casualties. But it might be worth it to get your hands on the armory equipment.
I won't sacrifice lives just so I can get my hands on some Imperial weapons.
Protect the troops.
Then we'll engage Darth Arho's Sith followers while the rest of the troops take on the Imperial soldiers.
Those weapons could swing this entire battle. Our troops understand that.
I want that armory.
If the Jedi are going to help secure the temple, someone is going to have to engage Darth Arho's Sith followers on the battlefield.
I agree with Caroowar. At least they have a fighting chance.
He's right. Send the Wookiees.
Be careful, Caroowar. The Sith are unlike any enemy you have ever faced. You only have to distract them, not defeat them.
Give the Sith a taste of that famous Wookiee battle fury!
So don't hold back.
I can handle a few extra Sith. You just worry about keeping your regiment alive.
Don't throw your lives away.
We can handle a few extra Sith. You just worry about keeping your regiment alive.
Don't throw your lives away.
That's an order, Caroowar! Do whatever is necessary to minimize Wookiee casualties.
Keep the Wookiees as part of the main army and let Jiyan Dar's regiment face the Sith.
The Ongree can handle this.
Be careful, Jiyan. The Sith are unlike any enemy you have ever faced. You only have to distract them, not defeat them.
Show the Sith the Ongree are warriors to be feared!
So don't hold back.
I can handle a few extra Sith. You just worry about keeping your regiment alive.
Don't throw your lives away.
We can handle a few extra Sith. You just worry about keeping your regiment alive.
Don't throw your lives away.
That's an order, Jiyan! Do whatever is necessary to minimize Ongree casualties.
What about air support, Commander? The Sullustan pilots are itching for a chance to avenge Yet Jub.
I share their pain. But the temple houses many irreplaceable artifacts that are unlikely to survive a series of air strikes.
It's your call. Your mission to infiltrate the temple will be a lot harder without air support.
We must do everything in our power to preserve the teachings and treasures of the great Jedi Masters.
We must protect the temple.
Those artifacts could turn out to be useful in our war against the Empire. We can't risk having them destroyed.
We must protect the temple.
You heard the Jedi, Bradber. Keep the Sullustans grounded.
Sir, the pilots can get a little reckless with their targets. This mission calls for more of a surgical strike.
We have to protect the temple.
You heard the major, Bradber. Keep the Sullustans grounded.
I'd hate to see all that treasure get blown to worthless bits. Kind of offends me just on principle.
Let's protect the temple.
Interesting point of view.
Okay, Bradber. Keep those Sullustans grounded.
Air support could save Republic lives. As valuable as the temple artifacts may be, they cannot be measured against a living being.
Send in air support.
Darth Arho's a Sith Lord. We need to seize every advantage we can get over him and his followers.
Send in air support.
You heard the Jedi, Bradber. Get those Sullustans in the air!
Winning the battle's more important than saving some artifacts, sir. Let the Sullustans have their revenge.
Send in air support.
You heard the major, Bradber. Get those Sullustans in the air!
If it makes my life easier, then I say: bombs away!
Send in air support.
Bradber--get those Sullustans in the air!
Copy that, Supreme Commander.
Here is the location of the escape tunnel into the Jedi Temple. Go there now; my people will follow once you've cleared the way.
Here is the location of the escape tunnel into the Jedi Temple. Go there now.
I'll send you updates on the progress of the battle. Good luck.
You're just in time. We're discussing our final attack plans. The Imperial troops have fallen back inside the Jedi Temple.
Arho's troops just raided our command post. Massive casualties on both sides.
Our boys drove them off, but the Imps captured Supreme Commander Rans. Jiyan Dar's ordered everyone back to the command post.
I need to get back to the base.
They'll need my help.
Is this a retreat, or is he massing troops for a counterattack?
What's Jiyan Dar planning?
Your guess is as good as mine.
The supreme commander sent too many troops to secure the mines. He left himself vulnerable.
Rans screwed up.
Rans had plenty of troops on hand. But Arho's insane. He sent his people into a massacre.
They lost twice as many soldiers as we did. He sacrificed hundreds just to capture Rans. Probably figured we'd fall apart without him.
Grab your gear and head back. Jiyan and the others will want to speak with you. We'll be right behind you.
Take whatever you can carry! Wipe everything else clean. Let's go--we're mobile in five minutes!
What's going on?
Report back to me after you take out Lord Loyat.
Agent Bradber? I've got the data from all the mine terminals.
I don't usually like working with civilians, but Rans was smart to put you on this. Let me contact him while this data's decrypting....
You Jedi types do good work. Rans was smart to put you on this. Let me contact him while this data's decrypting....
You can always count on Havoc Squad. Let me contact Rans while this data's decrypting....
Rans knew what he was doing when he put you on this. Let me contact him while this data's decrypting....
Supreme Commander Rans here. Master Boudyn is with me, too. Do we have the location of the Imperial command center?
Just got the coordinates. Looks like the orders were coming from a small Imperial base on the ground.
SIS scouted it before, but didn't think it was important enough to have priority.
With the whole planet under siege, Arho knew Republic intelligence would overlook something so minor.
Hiding in plain sight. Clever.
Take out that base, and we can end the assault on Ilum.
Send in the troops.
The galaxy is about to have one less Sith Lord in it.
Time to pay Arho a visit!
Doubt Darth Arho's actually there. SIS reports show he likes to stay clear while someone else handles things on the front lines.
He probably put his personal apprentice in charge. Lord Loyat is every bit as cruel and ruthless as her master.
SIS has a file on her. Pretty good with a lightsaber. Killed at least a dozen other Sith during her time on Korriban. Never punished for it.
Arho protected Loyat. Their relationship goes deeper than master and apprentice.
They're not the type of Sith who've been physically corrupted by the dark side, are they? You know how their skin gets all wrinkled and gray and gross?
Eww....
Uh... I don't really know.
Loyat may be a Sith Lord, but she's no match for me.
I'll deal with Loyat.
If we capture Loyat, maybe we can use her as leverage against Darth Arho.
They're lovers? Interesting...
Darth Arho is consumed by the dark side. He will cast her aside when she ceases to be useful.
She sounds dangerous. Be sure to send plenty of reinforcements when you move against that base.
Better send extra troops.
If we send troops in, Lord Loyat might evacuate to a new location. Our best chance is for you to go in alone.
You can try to arrest her if you think that's best. But I won't miss her if she winds up dead.
Once the base is out of commission, report back to Agent Bradber. Good luck.
Rans told me to help you out. But first, I need the data from all the mine terminals.
Sounds like a plan.
I volunteer to lead the Ongree regiment against the Sith, Supreme Commander.
No, Supreme Commander. Jiyan's regiment will be slaughtered. Let me lead the Wookiees against the Sith instead!
If we hold back, the Sith will send reinforcements to help protect the temple.
Finally, a real battle! The Sith's blood will stain the snow!
If we hold back, the Sith will send reinforcements to help protect the temple.
We may not look it, but the Ongree are warriors too. This will be a triumph remembered through the ages!
Send in air support.
Protect the Temple.
